reviews.review: I hate this movie this is Star Wars not marvel and certainly not good. Visually sure plot wise no. It just failed and what we got was the Rise of Mary Sue and the ruining of the prophecy I'm never watching a Disney made Star Wars again...

had low expectations going in after the last jedi thought the first half of the film was quite messy but the later half picked itself up and was quite strong. enjoyed the film but with a messy start to cover for past films mistakes 7/10 first half could have been a separate film or series.

This movie is so much more than I expected. The story and pacing keeps you on the edge of your seat and the humor keeps you comfortable there. The visuals are stunning and epic! JJ did an amazing job at putting a bow on the top of the 42 year gift that is the Star Wars series. Thank you!
Not the greatest Star Wars movie ever, definitely not the worst.  Fitting way to end the 9 movie saga that began 40+ years ago with hope.
Opening course correction is too fast, but does bring the movie and this trilogy to a satisfying conclusion.
Great movie...A must-see for Star Wars fan!
The Movie all around was great. I love how it tied up any loose ends and brought the story to a final close

It was a little face-paced. Felt like two movies in one sometimes... Didn't like the handling of some of the main characters and especially the ending. Overall, as a Star Wars movie enjoyed it. Had a lot of Star Wars iconic moments!

Been a Star Wars fan since my uncle showed me a New Hope when I was 5 years old, I've read most of the books, and seen most of the SW content out there. I loved this movie. It was emotionally draining and so fast paced that I had to sit there for a few minutes after to process what had just happened. But the pace and amount of things that happened is a good thing for me. More happened in 30 minutes of this movie than in most 2 hour films. Total redemption for me after being disappointed in the writing of TLJ. Looking back, the ending would not have been as satisfying without the choices that TLJ made so I already like that movie more for setting this one up. I think if you are a real star wars fan, and you want to see a fun, action packed, star wars movie, you will like this one. I'm tempted to give it 5 stars because I'm sure there are some trolls on here hating with their 1 star reviews, but it wasn't a perfect movie. But it was damn good and just about everything I wanted. My expectations were tempered by the last movie but this one shattered those expectations. John Williams score and it's importance to the movies can't be understated. I thought the acting by the main characters was above average and even great at times. Just ignore the haters and go see it.

Horrible, horrible, horrible. This movie insulted my intelligence. And it shows as plain as day, so that all the Sequel Trilogy defenders can see it and not deny it any longer, that these movies aren't good and that Disney had no idea what they were doing. This trilogy rendered past films useless, and then rendered itself useless in its finale. It's been an utter train wreck. But do not despair. The Skywalker saga already had its rather beautiful and perfect ending. Way back in 1983.

Thank goodness for George Lucas and his 6 film saga.
